name: abdominal aortic aneurysm
description: An abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) is a localized dilation of the abdominal aorta, typically defined as a diameter greater than 3 cm, which can lead to rupture and significant morbidity or mortality.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Presence or absence of abdominal aortic aneurysm

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: Presence of abdominal aortic aneurysm cannot be determined

values.name: unknown
values.description: Presence of abdominal aortic aneurysm is unknown

attributes.name: change from prior
attributes.description: Whether and how a abdominal aortic aneurysm has changed over time
